title: Looking for MID, TOP, JUNGLE for Tournament Team [SILVER +]
body:
Need a **MID**, **TOP**, and **JUNGLE** for a team to play in a tournament.

The tournament is FREE and will have RIOT PROVIDED prizes. It's not a university tournament so you don't have to be in uni.

**PLEASE** have a mic!! Communication is important. 

TOURNAMENT STARTS:
**9 APRIL, 1:00 PM AEST**

**Add me in game if you're interested** and message me the role you want to play. I will have try outs when I can and I will PM you details of the tournament.
**
IGN: TRUMP 2016**

REMINDER, I'M ONLY LOOKING FOR A **MID** A **TOP** AND A **JUNGLE**

replies.body:
Mid main, Plat 5 last season. i have coms can play anytime any day.
IGN: Kitty Katt
TOP main, add me if you want
